column5: This sheet is for you to mark down your goals with particular focus in the week.
To make it easier, split those big goals into smaller ones, so you know what exacly to do.
Rewarding yourself is important! Give yourself one depending on
which mark you got for each goal (from smaller to bigger of course)!

column1:
Stopping last bad habits
& Research and buy tokens to hold for 2024
Break the goal down into real tasks
Practice copywriting for atleast 1,5h + 30min analyze daily
Attend online classes and do assigments before TRW
Daily Bootcamp + atleast 1,5 hours of Learning Trading (notes)
